page.title: 10Recreation 1 - Yardley
page.content: One of the favourite recreation activities of the people we questioned was watching the television.Most of them preferred to watch Central as a channel,although almost as many people did not have a preference as to which channel they watched.No-one specified that they preferred BBC1,BBC2 or Channel 4.Quite a lot of people liked to watch soap operas like Dallas, especially women,although films were also popular with adults.A small minority of adults liked the News and documentaries.Sports programmes were only popular with men. Another popular recreation was listening to music.The most listened to type of music was Pop Music especially on Radio One,but Country and Western Music was popular as was Classical. Minority music tastes included Rock and Roll,Motown and Irish Country music.
